title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Flashing occurs when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example. All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash simultaneously.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash simultaneously.
